00018 #ifndef _UNITS_H
00019 #define _UNITS_H
00020 
00021 namespace votca { namespace moo {
00022 
00024 static const double RA=0.529189379; 
00025 static const double hbar_eV=6.58211899e-16; 
00026 static const double Hartree =27.211396132; 
00027 
00029 enum {
00030     nm=0,
00031     bohr,
00032     eV,
00033     hartree,
00034     m,
00035     A
00036 };
00037 
00039 template <bool t>
00040 struct ctassert {
00041   enum { N = 1 - 2 * int(!t) };
00043   static char A[N];
00045 };
00046 
00047 
00049 template<int,int>
00050 class unit{
00051 
00052 public:
00053 
00054     template <typename T>
00055     static T to(T d){  // is only called in case of an unspecified conversion
00056         ctassert<false> foo;
00057         return T();
00058     }
00059 };
00060 
00062 #define DEFINE_CONVERSION(a, b, c) \
00063 template <> \
00064 class unit <a,b> {\
00065 public: \
00066     template <typename T>\
00067     static T to(T value){\
00068         return c;\
00069     }\
00070 };
00071 
00073 DEFINE_CONVERSION(nm, bohr, value*10./RA);
00074 DEFINE_CONVERSION(bohr, nm, value*RA/10.);
00075 DEFINE_CONVERSION(eV, hartree, value/Hartree);
00076 DEFINE_CONVERSION(hartree, eV, value*Hartree);
00077 DEFINE_CONVERSION(m, nm, value*1E+9);
00078 DEFINE_CONVERSION(nm, m, value*1E-9);
00079 DEFINE_CONVERSION(A, bohr, value/RA);
00080 DEFINE_CONVERSION(bohr, A, value*RA);
00081 
00082 }}
00083 
00084 #endif /* _UNITS_H */
